ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable VARs when in ENV mode

DATABASE_URL.description: Your MongoDB URL for Database. Ask in Support Group: https://t.me/linux_repo

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: Do Force Sub! Add your Channel username which you want to do Force Sub. Read README.md file first!

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string. Get this from @BotFather

BOT_USERNAME.description: Your Bot Username. Without `@` before Username!

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Your Bot's Log Channel's Username. For Help ask in @linux_repo

AUTH_USERS.description: Allow only pre-defined users to use this bot as Sudo User. Separate with Space. Just for using Admin Commands.
